codeSystems.name: FlagStatus

codeSystems.description: Indicates whether this flag is active and needs to be displayed to a user, or whether it is no longer needed or was entered in error.

codeSystems.name: SNOMED_CT
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT (all versions)
codeSystems.description: SNOMED CT is the most comprehensive and precise clinical health terminology product in the world, owned and distributed around the world by The International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO).

codeSystems.name: ContactEntityType
codeSystems.title: Contact entity type
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the purpose for which you would contact a contact party.

codeSystems.name: EndpointConnectionType
codeSystems.title: Endpoint Connection Type
codeSystems.description: This is an example value set defined by the FHIR project, that could be used to represent possible connection type profile values.

codeSystems.name: EndpointPayloadType
codeSystems.title: Endpoint Payload Type
codeSystems.description: This is an example value set defined by the FHIR project, that could be used to represent possible payload document types.

codeSystems.name: FlagCategory
codeSystems.title: Flag Category
codeSystems.description: Example list of general categories for flagged issues. (Not complete or necessarily appropriate.)

codeSystems.name: OrganizationType
codeSystems.title: Organization type
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate a type of organization.

codeSystems.name: ParticipantType
codeSystems.title: Participant type
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter.

codeSystems.name: PractitionerRole
codeSystems.title: Practitioner role
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the role of a Practitioner.

codeSystems.name: Program
codeSystems.title: Program
codeSystems.description: This value set defines an example set of codes that could be can be used to classify groupings of service-types/specialties.

codeSystems.name: ServiceCategory

codeSystems.description: This value set defines an example set of codes that can be used to classify groupings of service-types/specialties.

codeSystems.name: ServiceProvisionConditions

codeSystems.description: The code(s) that detail the conditions under which the healthcare service is available/offered.

codeSystems.name: ReferralMethod

codeSystems.description: The methods of referral can be used when referring to a specific HealthCareService resource.

codeSystems.name: ServiceType

codeSystems.description: This value set defines an example set of codes of service-types.

codeSystems.name: IdentifierType
codeSystems.title: identifierType
codeSystems.description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying type of identifier. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging data types CX, PLN, PPN, XCN and XON.

codeSystems.name: AppointmentReason
codeSystems.title: appointmentReason
codeSystems.description: Code system of concepts used to describe the kind of appointment or the reason why an appointment has been scheduled.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the ARQ segment.

codeSystems.name: ParticipationType
codeSystems.title: ParticipationType
codeSystems.description: A code specifying the meaning and purpose of every Participation instance. Each of its values implies specific constraints on the Roles undertaking the participation.

codeSystems.name: Ietf3066
codeSystems.title: Tags for the Identification of Languages
